Congratulations to Mrs. Mullen and Mrs. Payne and the 5th and 6th grade Student Ambassadors spent part of the morning working on their first community service project. Please congratulate them on a job well done!

Next week, they will spend the day at The Teacher's Desk and volunteer at an organization that is so helpful to all of us every year. We are very proud of the students and hope they are learning the value of giving back to others.
